recipe.title: Cherry Tomato Relish
ingredients: 1/8 cup drained canned diced mild green chilies
instructions: Whisk vinegar and oregano in medium bowl to blend. Gradually whisk in oil. Mix in green chilies and green onions. (Can be made 6 hours ahead. Cover; chill.) Add tomatoes; toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper.
